Ingredients.1: 1.0 cups boiling water (do not add cold water)

Ingredients.2: 2 pkg. (8 serving size) JELL-O Brand Orange Flavor Gelatin

Directions.1: Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix in large bowl at least 3 min. until gelatin is completely dissolved. Pour into 13x9-inch pan.

Directions.2: Refrigerate at least 3 hours or until firm.

Directions.3: Dip bottom of pan in warm water 15 sec. Cut into 24 decorative shapes, using 2-inch Halloween-shaped cookie cutters, making sure to cut all the way through gelatin to bottom of pan. Lift gelatin shapes from pan. Store in tightly covered container in refrigerator.
